_comments.all: This configuration file controls the text and labels displayed in the 'Claim Voucher' modal.
_comments.default: Settings for the initial view of the modal where the user enters their email.
_comments.submitting: Text displayed while the claim is being processed.
_comments.success: Content shown after a voucher is successfully claimed.
_comments.error: Content shown when an unexpected error occurs.
_comments.alreadyClaimed: Content shown if the user has already claimed this voucher.
_comments.expired: Content shown if the voucher has expired.

success.title: Voucher Claimed!
success.message: Success! A confirmation has been sent to your email with instructions on how to use your voucher.

alreadyClaimed.title: Already Claimed
alreadyClaimed.message: It looks like you've already claimed this voucher with this email address. Please check your inbox.

expired.title: Voucher Expired
expired.message: Unfortunately, this voucher has expired and is no longer available to be claimed.
